title: Remove debug/test API endpoints
description: Debug endpoints /api/test/e2b and /api/test/groq exposed in production

title: Add React error boundaries
description: No error.tsx files in app router; unhandled errors show raw error page

title: Add resource limits to frontend and gateway
description: Frontend and UEF Gateway containers have no CPU/memory limits

title: Create user database schema
description: No persistent user/profile storage; NextAuth JWT only stores session

title: Frontend component tests
description: Zero test coverage for 49 frontend components

title: Database backup automation
description: No automated backup strategy for SQLite or file-based data

title: Set up error tracking (Sentry)
description: No error tracking or APM; production errors go unnoticed

title: Implement password recovery flow
description: Forgot-password UI exists but no backend handler

title: Complete stub dashboard pages
description: 9 dashboard pages are stubs (admin boomerangs build chat circuit-box environments house-of-ang lab pipelines)

description: 5 API routes are stubs/incomplete (diy admin/api-keys boomerangs deploy invite make-it-mine)

title: API documentation (OpenAPI)
description: No API documentation for 32 endpoints

title: Rollback procedure documentation
description: No documented rollback procedure for failed deployments

title: Uptime monitoring
description: No external monitoring or alerting for service outages

title: Add loading states to dashboard pages
description: Most dashboard pages lack loading.tsx skeleton screens

title: Client-side form validation with Zod
description: Zod is in deps but not wired to forms; only basic presence checks

title: Accessibility audit (ARIA attributes)
description: No ARIA attributes visible; Lighthouse audit needed

description: No data retention policy documented

title: PII handling documentation
description: No PII handling documentation

title: Architecture Decision Records
description: No ADRs for architectural choices

title: Log aggregation setup
description: No centralized log collection (ELK/Loki/CloudWatch)

title: Incident response plan
description: No runbook for outages or incidents

title: Redis-backed rate limiting
description: Rate limiting uses in-memory store; resets on deploy

description: Mixed persistence: SQLite + file-based + PostgreSQL across layers
